question:
Which of the following statements is/ are correct about the contents of the universe? 
  1. Ordinary matter - 4.9 % 
  2. Dark energy - 26.8 %
  3. Dark matter - 68.3 % 
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The universe is composed of Dark matter (26.8 %), dark energy (68.3%) and ordinary matter (4.9%).
